sentences.en: And he often finds his life so colorful and interesting as he overcomes all the difficulties.
sentences.cn: 他经常觉得他的生活是丰富多彩和有趣的，因为他克服了所有的困难。

sentences.en: And I should pray for the glory of a colorful sunset.
sentences.cn: 而且,我该为艳丽的落日光辉而祈祷.

sentences.en: Because of her hard working, her garden was so colorful.
sentences.cn: 因为她的努力，她的花园是如此的丰富多彩。

sentences.en: Casey Stengel was probably the most colorful character in baseball.
sentences.cn: 凯西·施滕格尔可能是棒球界最有趣的人物。

sentences.en: He gave a colorful account of life in Samoa.
sentences.cn: 他生动地叙述了萨摩亚群岛上的生活.

sentences.en: Her mother had mentioned how colorful the yard was, now that spring had arrived.
sentences.cn: 她母亲提到由于春天已经来到,院子里已是五彩缤纷, 非常美丽.

sentences.en: His members in Eighth Army was very colorful.
sentences.cn: 他的第八军团组成分子非常复杂.

sentences.en: I hope my life to be colorful and valuable.
sentences.cn: 我希望我的生活是丰富多彩的和有价值的。

sentences.en: Joe was always good for a colorful quote.
sentences.cn: 乔总能绘声绘色地旁征博引。

sentences.en: Life was a colorful painful pageant to her.
sentences.cn: 生活对她说来是一场丰富多彩而痛苦的表演.

sentences.en: Many of the dancers at the fancy dress ball wore colorful masks.
sentences.cn: 化装舞会上的许多跳舞者戴着五颜六色的面具。

sentences.en: Nation by nation , the colorful groups march by.
sentences.cn: 绚丽多彩的运动员队伍, 按国别一队一队地走过.

sentences.en: People wore colorful clothes and seemed to be having a good time.
sentences.cn: 人们穿着五颜六色的衣服，似乎玩得很开心。

sentences.en: The Chinese, though with more colorful language, were equally prudent.
sentences.cn: 中国人尽管语言更生动些, 也同样持慎重态度.

sentences.en: The colorful whirl of the dancers was beautiful to watch.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈者多彩多姿的旋转令人赏心悦目.

sentences.en: The latest in sports bras are colorful tops designed as outerwear.
sentences.cn: 最新款的运动内衣是一种可外穿的彩色上装。

sentences.en: The little girl, fascinated by the colorful names, said, " Are Giants stronger than Pirates? "
sentences.cn: 小女孩给那些稀奇古怪的队名迷住了, 答非所问他说: “ 巨人队比海盗队更强 吧 ? ”

sentences.en: Visitors can view a rich and colorful array of aquatic plants and animals.
sentences.cn: 游客们可以看到一系列各种各样、色彩斑斓的水生动植物。

words.tran_cn: 有色的；着色的；有色人种的
无色的；苍白的；无趣味的
着色；着色剂；配色；天然色；外貌
把...染色，粉饰，脸红（color的过去时和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 色彩鲜艳的，有趣的，丰富多彩的
